version_description:
Based on your feedback:
- Enabled sound in videos, even when your Ring/Silent switch is on
- Swapped two exercise videos
- Improved the results-calendar
- Some small fixes

Do you have any feedback? Let us know!

- Added exercise instructions alert
- Improved video playback
- Fixed launch image
- Fixed small result-calender bug

Do you have any feedback? Let us know!

Here is the new update for the official Innerfire app!

We’ve fixed some technical issues and improved overall usability.

The size of the app has been significantly reduced, freeing up precious space on your device.

The start/stop button is now bigger, making it easier to tap during the breathing exercises.

The contact information has also been updated.

Stay tuned for further updates; we are working on new features, including adding notes and entering results retroactively!

We've received a lot of useful feedback, and were able to make significant upgrades. Here's what's new for v3.4:

Fixes:
· Fixed a Calendar bug
· Fixed a Video Player bug
· Assorted minor fixes

Features:
· Brand-new UI
· Cold showers can now be timed in minutes & seconds
· Results can now be added manually, and viewed in detail
· Notes can be added to the results

BONUS: We have a special offer for those who have completed all exercises at least once, so grab this latest version and get to breathing!

We've received a lot of useful feedback, and were able to make significant upgrades. Here's what's new for v3.4:

Fixes:
· Fixed a Calendar bug
· Fixed a Video Player bug
· Assorted minor fixes

Features:
· Brand-new UI
· Cold showers can now be timed in minutes & seconds
· Results can now be added manually, and viewed in detail
· Notes can be added to the results
· Auto-lock is now disabled (even when stopwatch is not running)

BONUS: We have a special offer for those who have completed all exercises at least once, so grab this latest version and get to breathing!

We've received a lot of useful feedback, and were able to make significant upgrades. Here's what's new for v3.5:

Features:
· Brand-new Apple Watch App!
· Updated some exercise videos
· Reduced app size

Fixes:
· Assorted minor fixes

BONUS: We have a special offer for those who have completed all exercises at least once, so grab this latest version and get to breathing!

With this latest update, the WHM app is now free, and has been cross-integrated with the wimhofmethod.com platform for seamless synchronization of your results. In addition, the following features have been added to make for an even better experience:

• Completely redesigned interface
• Push notifications that bring you news fresh off the press
• Graphs for a clear visualization of your results
• One-on-One audio files for offline practice in remote locations (If your are a member of our fundamentals course)

* Fixed one-on-one iOS 9.3 crashes

Version 4.0.0:

With this latest update, the WHM app is now free, and has been cross-integrated with the wimhofmethod.com platform for seamless synchronization of your results. In addition, the following features have been added to make for an even better experience:

• Completely redesigned interface
• Push notifications that bring you news fresh off the press
• Graphs for a clear visualization of your results
• One-on-One audio files for offline practice in remote locations (If your are a member of our fundamentals course)
